verses.verse: A Psalm of David<WH1732>. Unto thee, O LORD<WH3068>, do I lift up<WH5375> my soul<WH5315>.
O my God<WH430>, I trust<WH982> in thee: let me not be ashamed<WH954>, let not mine enemies<WH341> triumph<WH5970> over me.
Yea, let none that wait<WH6960> on thee be ashamed<WH954>: let them be ashamed<WH954> which transgress<WH898> without cause<WH7387>.
Shew<WH3045> me thy ways<WH1870>, O LORD<WH3068>; teach<WH3925> me thy paths<WH734>.
Lead<WH1869> me in thy truth<WH571>, and teach<WH3925> me: for thou art the God<WH430> of my salvation<WH3468>; on thee do I wait<WH6960> all the day<WH3117>.
Remember<WH2142>, O LORD<WH3068>, thy tender mercies<WH7356> and thy lovingkindnesses<WH2617>; for they have been ever of old<WH5769>.
Remember<WH2142> not the sins<WH2403> of my youth<WH5271>, nor my transgressions<WH6588>: according to thy mercy<WH2617> remember<WH2142> thou me for thy goodness'<WH2898> sake, O LORD<WH3068>.
Good<WH2896> and upright<WH3477> is the LORD<WH3068>: therefore will he teach<WH3384> sinners<WH2400> in the way<WH1870>.
The meek<WH6035> will he guide<WH1869> in judgment<WH4941>: and the meek<WH6035> will he teach<WH3925> his way<WH1870>.
All the paths<WH734> of the LORD<WH3068> are mercy<WH2617> and truth<WH571> unto such as keep<WH5341> his covenant<WH1285> and his testimonies<WH5713>.
For thy name's<WH8034> sake, O LORD<WH3068>, pardon<WH5545> mine iniquity<WH5771>; for it is great<WH7227>.
What man<WH376> is he that feareth<WH3373> the LORD<WH3068>? him shall he teach<WH3384> in the way<WH1870> that he shall choose<WH977>.
His soul<WH5315> shall dwell<WH3885> at ease<WH2896>; and his seed<WH2233> shall inherit<WH3423> the earth<WH776>.
The secret<WH5475> of the LORD<WH3068> is with them that fear<WH3373> him; and he will shew<WH3045> them his covenant<WH1285>.
Mine eyes<WH5869> are ever<WH8548> toward the LORD<WH3068>; for he shall pluck<WH3318> my feet<WH7272> out of the net<WH7568>.
Turn<WH6437> thee unto me, and have mercy<WH2603> upon me; for I am desolate<WH3173> and afflicted<WH6041>.
The troubles<WH6869> of my heart<WH3824> are enlarged<WH7337>: O bring thou me out<WH3318> of my distresses<WH4691>.
Look<WH7200> upon mine affliction<WH6040> and my pain<WH5999>; and forgive<WH5375> all my sins<WH2403>.
Consider<WH7200> mine enemies<WH341>; for they are many<WH7231>; and they hate<WH8130> me with cruel<WH2555> hatred<WH8135>.
O keep<WH8104> my soul<WH5315>, and deliver<WH5337> me: let me not be ashamed<WH954>; for I put my trust<WH2620> in thee.
Let integrity<WH8537> and uprightness<WH3476> preserve<WH5341> me; for I wait<WH6960> on thee.
Redeem<WH6299> Israel<WH3478>, O God<WH430>, out of all his troubles<WH6869>.
